content: TIL about https://docs.usebruno.com/introduction/what-is-bruno Would this be helpful when creating sth like this for the DV API to get people started using it and also have another option to test the API?
I do love a project with a manifesto.
Today I learned about https://rest.sh and how neat it would be to have a nice & clean API and immediately transform that into a dvcli.
Wow, Ryan Reynolds writes blog posts for Bruno: https://blog.usebruno.com/author/ryan-reynolds
I watched https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FXckKHtZo4o and I have a better sense of what Bruno is, I think.
